name: Emerge (Mohammad Ashour, surplusPolyCount, larsdahl, asbutt, ren3101, BRUNOTEMC, MRxRadex)
name_original: Emerge (Mohammad Ashour, surplusPolyCount, larsdahl, asbutt, ren3101, BRUNOTEMC, MRxRadex)
description: A traumatic episode in your home sends you, a young child, into a nightmare coma. Escape the house of horrors! Use your joined spirit companion to help you escape.
